parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.72</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Custom Panels </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array of all components available to given object info panel. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[infoPanelComponents]] panelID </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the concerned vehicle </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> panelID: [[String]] - "left" or "right" can be used as panel names </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [className, componentType, isAccessible]:
* className: [[String]] - component classname as defined in object/vehicle config
* componentType: [[String]] - componentType - component type
* isAccessible: [[Boolean]] - boolean flag that shows if component is currently accessible (lack of required item can make it temporarily inaccessible) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [unit, turretPath] [[infoPanelComponents]] panelID </value></part><part><name>Alternative Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the concerned vehicle </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] - turret index </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> panelID: [[String]] - "left" or "right" can be used as panel names </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - format [className, componentType, isAccessible]:
* className: [[String]] - component classname as defined in object/vehicle config
* componentType: [[String]] - componentType - component type
* isAccessible: [[Boolean]] - boolean flag that shows if component is currently accessible (lack of required item can make it temporarily inaccessible) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code><template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>// returns array of all components configured for _helicopter pilot seat</value></part></template>
_componentsData = [_helicopter, [-1]] [[infoPanelComponents]] "VehicleSystemsDisplayManagerComponentLeft";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3 Custom Info]], [[infoPanel]], [[infoPanels]], [[setInfoPanel]], [[enableInfoPanelComponent]], [[infoPanelComponentEnabled]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
